website_summaries.verdict: A lipstick that truly lasts all day, no matter what you get up to.
pros: 2-in-1 Liquid lipstick and top coat dries quickly without drying out your lips
Stays in place all day, even while eating, drinking, or kissing
Small, pointed brush makes for easy application
cons: Difficult to remove with soap & water
Instead, try an oil-based makeup remover

customer_reviews.title: Stays on, lasts long.
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite! It stays on and lasts all day. I touch up only the gloss when I need a little moisturizer. Pictured is Just Teasing. I also love Heart Breaker - which is more of a dark rust/brick red color. Both can be worn full bold color or by blotting when applied, the color is more muted. Both ways, the color lasts and does not smear.
customer_reviews.author: Stephaniek219

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip stain I have ever used. It lasted through a greasy burrito and then I slept in it over night and it still lasted through the whole next day with just a little touch up on the bottom when I woke up. Photo is when I woke up, before touch up. It didn't feel sticky or chapped at all. Better than the Sephora that I normally get and way cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Ame Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Over 12Hrs Without Fading or Smudging
customer_reviews.text: I applied this at 12:00pm and as of 12:38am (as I write this review) the color is still solid with no fading and I didn’t have to reapply at all during these 12 hours (eating, drinking, lip biting and the like 😉). It didn’t even fade!! *** I applied desired coverage then waited about 2 minutes before applying step 2 (shine & set) *** It definitely does as advertised and I am very pleased. BUY IT!! EDIT:: I'm still loving this lipstick 3 months later 😃 (second photo)
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Harrison

customer_reviews.title: awesome sauce
customer_reviews.text: It really is kiss proof ! And food and drink proof it doesn't flake off and if lasts all day long !!!!!!! I even wore it to my wedding and not a smudge for our first kiss and its so moisturing unlike other brands I love this so much I will buy it in every color I got the color kiss me you fool
customer_reviews.author: peyton

customer_reviews.title: Really stays on!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. It really stays on for the whole day. My daughter wore it to her bridal shower and she still had it on the next morning. I immediately went out to buy it for myself and had the same experience. I used a 24 hour lipstick remover made by a different company to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Mystic Dog Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the cost. No smell smooth even application
customer_reviews.text: Heartbreaker was dark than I expected. But the color is great for fair skin looking for a darker shade. The gloss that came with this doesnt seem to have much in it either. Its very thick... i just ordered and extra gloss since I love the color with my skin so much. I also ordered 2 other colors and hopefully they work just as nice. This doesnt cause cracking or dry looking lips unlike too faced matte lip sticks. Too faced mattes are 6-10 times this cost and look like ur lips have been in the dessert. This product is amazing for the money. Hopefully it lasts all night like it says. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike was that the step 2 product ran out sooner than step 1 product. But found a solution for that (see picture) and now all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Punny Pina

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting but needs different moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this because it is kissproof!! My husband loves to kiss me in red lips but doesn’t like to wear it! lol 😂 😉 I just don’t like how fast the moisturizer clear stuff goes away. I end up using normal plain lip balm instead. Otherwise i like this other complaint is as time goes on (6 hours into wearing) the inside of my lips are no longer colored it wears off there faster than the outside of the lips.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: This color is amazing! Play with Fire*** This lipstick totally rocks
customer_reviews.text: Omg! This color is amazing! Play with Fire*** This lipstick totally rocks! My man was bummed that I would never let him kiss me during the first hour of putting on lipstick, but now this! Also, no reapplying after eating/drinks. Love it! New favorite lipstick. Getting a bunch of colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I now love it and happy i got it
customer_reviews.text: I got this because i needed to meet the $49 for free shipping and wasnt expecting much. I now love it and happy i got it. Lasts a long time i put it on in the morning and didnt need to touch up even once.
customer_reviews.author: EmpressDraconia

customer_reviews.title: Personality conflict
customer_reviews.text: I agree this would stay on 16 hours LOL if you can get it on I find it hard to apply evenly without it looking cakey or getting everywhere and forget cutting your lips and making them look neat after it's on because this stuff is like super glue LOL it takes a minute to dry but if you're a pro you might like this if not try at your own risk LOL I think I will stick to my beauty glazed sadly though they don't have this color this is by far the only Rimmel London product I've ever tried and had an issue with so it may just be me because they're known for Quality makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Shade989

customer_reviews.title: Lipstick for life
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I wear it virtually every day. My review is for the Heartbreaker shade and its pretty darn near perfect. Its what I would, in my unprofessional layman terms, call a dark neutral. It looks good against probably all skin tones and lasts HOURS (depending on how much coffee you drink) before you need to reapply it. Neither the lip colour or the shine-watchamacallit taste strongly or bad. Its kiss proof, mostly. Sometimes it leaves a bit of a smudge, sometimes not. I have used this, in most of the colours, since I discovered it over two years ago and will continue to use it until they stop making it.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: goes in chunks (hard like chopstick, so not for spreading with brush)
customer_reviews.text: The color is gorgeous, and goes down smoothly. But texture of the 2nd layer gloss material s strange. Its not smooth or liquid.does not really spread well over the color, goes in chunks (hard like chopstick, so not for spreading with brush). Not sure if some old batch. Also color starts coming off on the inner sides of the lips in chunks pretty soon after application. Def not 16 hrs stay on as advertised. Maybe 3-4 at the most. Have to completely remove before reapplyin if dnt want lipstick start peeling and crumble.
customer_reviews.author: SteadFast

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I got the I’ll call you color. It’s like a matte pastel pink. So pretty I thought it would be too light for me cuz I’m a black woman and I have dark brown skin. It’s amazing not dry or hard. No cracked lips. And it is transfer free. I might add pics once I get dolled up for you ladies who are darker skin toned and sketchy about this!
customer_reviews.author: IG xsixela

customer_reviews.title: GLITTER!?
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I decided to branch out from my usual Revlon Colorstay and try the Rimmel long wearing version. While the color Just Teasing is pretty and the product appears to have the same staying power as the Revlon version, this has GLITTER IN IT. Not just a little mica for shine, actual glitter. It looks like I’ve been playing in a teen’s makeup kit. As a grown woman in my 40’s, GLITTER is the last thing I want in my lip product. I do not understand why this was not mentioned in other reviews because this is a deal breaker. But, hey, if you’re 12, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting 24-hour color
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! In order to get the product to set properly, you must put on color and keep lips apart for about 10 seconds or so until dry. Then apply the gloss, same process. If you don't wait for it to dry and apply too soon, your lipstick will smudge and get flaky. The shade is perfect for a natural look and everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: lasts a pretty long time.
customer_reviews.text: i love the color. its a bit hard to work with but its really pigmented, it lasts for a long time and it doesnt feel drying at all. it does last through pretty much everything, eating, kissing, etc(in case u were wondering it doesnt last through a bj). though when it wears off it like flakes around the inside. also to touch it up you cant just put a bit more on you have to remove it completely and redo it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth m.

customer_reviews.title: 1 Hour Proof?
customer_reviews.text: I was intrigued with the reviews and longevity of the product. More than a typical long-wear lip product, it was VERY drying and immediately settled into any Imperfections you may have. The part 2 “gloss” texture was more like a balm. It did moisturize a bit but hardly any shine. I let it settle for half an hour before drinking and it came right off and the effect looked what your lips would look after a long day at work. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeplessinseattle206

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm crazy about this lip stain. I can't believe that it lasts all day long and doesn't smudge off at all. It seriously is amazing and such a good color! The one side is color and the other side helps give your lips a glossy smooth look. Of course the gloss doesn't last that long but the color does. I will definitely keep buying this, it's a total beauty staple for me now.
customer_reviews.author: Kikenie

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed properly— tampered with
customer_reviews.text: The lipstick did not have a security seal. Instead, it was heavily taped shut. I can only guess it was tampered with, since Rimmel London doesn't package their products in crooked, wrinkled piles of sticky tape. I am too afraid to use it, since it was clearly opened and resealed, and will be throwing it away without use. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I've worn over 16hrs without needing to reapply or touch up. I can't speak on the gloss as I don't use it. My lips don't feel dry and I don't care for gloss or the look [in general]. My new favorite over Revlon colorstay overtime and Covergirl 16hr outlast. I don't touch my lips or eat/drink for 45 mins after applying. I can even brush my teeth [which my toothpaste uses a lil oil] without transfer. Also have to use makeup remover [Garnier] when I want it off, unlike Revlon and Covergirl which remove easily with Vaseline and water.
customer_reviews.author: Krypta9

customer_reviews.title: Color is off
customer_reviews.text: I love this product in that it is long lasting. And it's so affordable. Be careful with the color swatches though. I bought the color "I'll call you" and it looked like a rosy neutral color. However it was a pretty bright pink, almost Barbie pink. You're better off finding the actual colors in a store. Cvs carries this.
customer_reviews.author: pikapie55

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have used all the long-lasting lipsticks on the market, and I assure you that this is the best. It beats everyone's on longevity and cost, and I can't believe how long it lasts. The tube lasted me twice what others do. I will never use anything but Rimmel. The only challenge is getting the shade correct because it's very difficult to display color accurately on a website.
customer_reviews.author: PurrCat

customer_reviews.title: Great unless you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It lasted about 10 hours total for me BUT after about 7 hours and eating a couple times you could only see the outer lining in color, not my full lips. Honestly I love it but can't give a 5 star because I broke out in pimples on my lip line (3 zits) the next morning which looks gross. So my skin doesn't like.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Liquid leaks, not enough wax finish
customer_reviews.text: The lipstick is messy as it does not stay on the applicator tip only but also runs down the shaft as well, leaking liquid at the holder. Also, the finishing side does not adhere to the applicator tip very much, thus you have to keep plunging it in several times to get the wax. I will not buy this product every again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Kahanu

customer_reviews.title: love love love this lipstick
customer_reviews.text: So seriously ,I had called for an appointment to get pemanent lip color , awaiting her return call and I decided to order 2 different lipsticks that claim to stay on all day . I got this one and a covergirl one . This rimmel is the best ,stays on all day even after you eat . Good coverage so I can go a little out of my lip line .I wouldn't give covergirl a bad review but it really dried my lips out . I actually cancelled the permanent lip color appointment. This stuff is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: MASK PROOF!
customer_reviews.text: This lip stain lasted through a 7 hour shift where I wore the mask the entire time and talked and the mask was pressed against my lips. I wiped the lipstain from my lips to eat (something I do with all lip products) and afterwards reapplied. I went on a date where I drank alcohol and kissed a lot. This photo was taken at 2am after my date. The lip stain is still in place. My lips feel soft and moisturized (although they look matte). I strongly recommend this lip stain!
customer_reviews.author: LaFonda Baker

customer_reviews.title: Once you try this line of glosses you will never overpay again
customer_reviews.text: This whole line of Rimmel lipsticks is crazy good , I’m a big make up fan and spend a lot of money on makeup. So over the years I’ve purchased a huge verity of lipsticks and glosses, some of them were really expensive. After I’ve tried this one for the first time and realized that I’ve paid like $5 for a lipsticks that last for a good 10 hours and doesn’t smear on everything my lips touched I just went online and purchased every color for me and my mom. Can’t believe I’ve spent $30 on one lipstick at MAC when clearly this one is way better and costs only $5
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Only had to reapply once, maybe twice in a day on the inner part of my bottom lip. After eating food and drinking, it seemed to rub some of the product off of the part of my mouth that touched the food. It was not horrible and wasn't very noticeable by others, but I reapplied anyway to give a fuller lip look. Very impressed with color and stay time, when wearing it all day! The lipgloss is a little thick and needs a few dips to get enough to make a difference, but is needed to get rid of the little bit of stickiness from the lipstick, not a big deal, but makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.D

customer_reviews.title: Color is darker & not the color as bottle.
customer_reviews.text: It is long lasting. Color us not red at all. Its more of dark orange or brown undertone when i put it on- instead of the red i thought it was going to be of bottle- dissapointed for sure. You tube videos on some girls show up as the color when the bottle was in white. Im olive skin. Top coat has an aftertaste i definately do not like.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this all day and it didn’t come off till I took it off with baby oil that night. LOVE this!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly B

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with how long this lipstick stays, though I thought it would be lighter. However, it looks good on me and I will keep it. I will probably order something lighter next time because I like how long-lasting it is. You just have to remember to let it dry before you eat or drink anything or apply the gloss side of the duo.
customer_reviews.author: June Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick is fantastic! It has a nice color and stays on for DAYS with only one application. I get compliments all of the time on the lipstick and asked what kind it is. This is the ONLY lipstick that I will use now. If you want lips like a model, I highly recommend Provocalips!
customer_reviews.author: DrJean

customer_reviews.title: This stuff lasts and lasts
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, it went on smoothly, and I went on with my day. I didn't think anything more about it until I blotted my lips after dinner. There was a hint of lipstick on my napkin after 12 hours. What?!?! This stuff lasts for 12 hours or more. Wow! It isn't sticky like some others. It is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Rimmel has great price and quality with this truly long lasting lipstick.
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest and best long lasting lipstick I have found. I have tried many drugstore and higher end long wear lipsticks and this is as good or tops them all. The colors do not appear as shown online. I like a deep red color and found Playing with Fire to be a great shade. I wear it matte or glossy. Heart Breaker is too orangey with some sparkle but I will still wear. The only caveat is that the tube cracked (after much use) and became a little leaky. One tube lasts for long time. Rimmel also makes great mascara. This is becoming my go to brand for great price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ldotso

customer_reviews.title: Favorite ! I love these. Better than expensive ones.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite lipsticks because you do not have to worry about how they look after eating , talking , and smiling . The color will last and it does not feel heavy . These are the only lipsticks I would buy over super expensive ones that can be removed easily . So happy I found these at a store and now I can purchase many colors here . Can’t express how much I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for long-lasting lip color. It lasts pretty much all day for me, unless I have something really oily to eat. It does have that kind of "plasticy" feel that most long lasting lipsticks have. Another reviewer suggested blotting with a tissue right after you apply, and that helps take away some of the plastic feel. Heart Breaker is a neutral color, but a pretty dark neutral. More of a fall color than a spring color.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS LIPSTICK, it lasts!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lipstick. It is the ONLY kind that doesn’t disappear on my lips before I walk out the door. Be careful, though, it is hard to get off of anything you don’t want it on!
customer_reviews.author: LeighTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Came with broken seals.
customer_reviews.text: This came with the seals broken on both ends. The consistency was different than any of the other provocalips colors. It seemed like it had been tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Really stays on there
customer_reviews.text: You can eat, drink, rub your face and it will not come off. The top coat wears off pretty quickly though, recoat with another moisturizer frequently to prevent cracking or caking. Does not come with enough top coat to keep applying or even equal out to the color base. I use a Nivea chapstick once the clear coat runs out. Color base stains nicely and does not wear off for about 36 hours once set (even through a face wash at night and shower in the morning). Will smudge/smear before it completely dries.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Llorens

customer_reviews.title: My favourite shade
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I cannot find this in stores for the past few years, but yay for Amazon and now it's on my subscribe and save. The best natural colour for me, affordable too. It goes on easily, lasts the whole work day (about 10 hours) and doesn't rub off on cups or forks and so on. Unlike a lot of paint lipsticks, it doesn't crack or feather, it looks so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Protogere

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED EMPTY
customer_reviews.text: Arrived empty! The seal was broken, one brush looked used, and the color tube was completely empty. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: ThreatLevelMidnight

customer_reviews.title: Stays on even my thin lips
customer_reviews.text: This stays on very well- most of the time through eating. If I don’t was it off before bed it will mostly still be there when I wake up but does not rub off on my pillow. It is not as drying as other long wear lip colors. I like to apply the gloss often so it runs out before the color. Any gloss will work
customer_reviews.author: LR Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great a d long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really doesn't move!! I put it on in the morning and my lips still have color by afternoon after eating, drinking, masks, etc. Works great with masks because it won't smudge off on the fabric. Sometimes I refresh the color in the later afternoon, but even then, it doesn't flake off or look bad.
customer_reviews.author: Megs814

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this lipstain
customer_reviews.text: I love Rimmel's lip stains! I think i have like 5 or 6 shades. If I forget to take it off it's still there in the morning - faded from sleeping, eating, etc for 24 hours, but still there. I never wore lipstick because not only did it not last that long, but I got it all over my hands, my face and anything that got near my face. I don't have that problem anymore with this product. TIP FOR REMOVAL: a makeup removing balm, I use Clinique's.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Replacement lipstick was fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite lipsticks. Since I was ordering other items, I decided to order it in Amazon, rather than go to the store. It was wrapped well and the tube seemed to have tape on it. However step 1 color was fine but Step 2 was dry and therefore the process wasn’t complete. Not sure Why Step 2 was dry or empty. I’ve never had problem with this same Rimmel lipstick before. Replacement lipstick was perfect - sealed well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pro: It Does stay on all day with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Pro: It Does stay on all day with no reappying. I ate, I wiped my lips, I kissed my boyfriend. Con: It would not come off with any kind of makeup remover or soap. My lips were sore and red after trying to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: JOE HAYNES

customer_reviews.title: Love Provocalips, Didn't love Kiss Fatal color IRL
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Provocalips. I was slightly disappointed in this color (Kiss Fatal) because it looks like it should be more purple... but it is more of a brown hue when I wear it. Brown isn't really my color, so I don't usually wear this one. I still gave it 4 stars though because the application is great as always, and it still stays on all day just like it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware colors aren’t as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I had to leave a one star review because the picture they have of berry seductive is nothing like the actual product. It’s bright red. Like fire engine red whereas the picture is a purple pink. So disappointed because this is my favorite lip stain but the color is not what I thought I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: LKHerron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a lipstick that stays on, and then this is the one to get. I learned that the less you apply, the better it works. I have had numerous compliments on the color and how nice it looks. The only thing that I don't like is you run out of the sealer/gloss too soon. I still have plenty of the lip stain but no sealer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanice

customer_reviews.title: Cracks and flakes...yet cannot get it off
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 times. It lasted 1-2 hours before cracking and flaking. Then, I couldn't get it off. I tried everything, Castor oil, coconut oil, Soap, exfoliator glove, Even nail polish remover. Nothing works. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.Allt

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 days! Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I am not normally amazed by makeup but I used just the color and it lasted 2 days, through meals and teeth brushing. I was amazed. I think it actually lasted less tone when I used the top coat. Only downside was that my 5 year old son said he didn’t like the color ... but the rest of my family likes it. And I was wowed by the staying power.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The best long lasting lipstick
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite lipsticks to buy. The color is wonderful, but most importantly, it's comfortable to wear. After putting on the top coat, I can eat a slice of pizza or eat some saucy spaghetti and this stuff will hold on nicely, without fading out or becoming uncomfortable. The best long lasting lipstick!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: I DON'T LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: It's too sticky and started clumping up on my lips after a while. I do not like it. But it is a pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great, just hope they get the right one to you!
customer_reviews.text: This product and pretty good, doesn't wash off or smear unless you wash it off. Only problem I have is that they sent me the wrong color.... On the picture-the one on the left is the one I got and the one on the right is the one I wanted. I wanted a bright red and I got a burnt brown red.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Lips feels dried out
customer_reviews.text: While the color is nice and it wears practically all day, it does leave the lips feeling very dry. The product seems to crumble on the lips after several hours and trying to reapply just makes it looked caked on. I'm sure there are more soothing, long-term lipstains out there for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color and lasts forever!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite! Lasts forever and such a pretty pink. I wear it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Brittaney Allen

customer_reviews.title: Smears and then stains skin around lips, but not so much lips themselves
customer_reviews.text: This product isn't really a lip stain, its more of a highly pigmented liquid lipstick and smears way too easily, staining everything EXCEPT my lips
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Decker

customer_reviews.title: Can't stand this!
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice for the first 30-45 minutes and then it starts coming off. It feels tacky and makes my lips stick together. I have to continuously keep adding more top coat just so my lips don't feel tacky. It's just not worth it. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Long-lasting Color
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color! It’s nerve wracking buying a new color online but I’m happy with this and would buy again. The clear coat is nice to make it feel smoother but I can see me running out of that way before the color which is a bit disappointing but I would rebuy and try another color even.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Nice product nice product compared to most 24hr color stay. Will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like this lipstick however it doesnt always stay well but the colors are nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Baker

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: I would not order this again. Too drying and I need to put a topper on it because the color turns orangey. This may be because of my personal chemistry but it is definitely not on my repurchase list
customer_reviews.author: Elaine L

customer_reviews.title: Great Longlasting lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Just what I’ve been looking for. I don’t have time to keep checking and reapplying lipstick. It’s definitely still there when I get the chance to check it. I Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AThompson

customer_reviews.title: my lips are swooning
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite lip product. I love that I apply it once in the morning, and it lasts ALL DAY LONG. I drink a lot of water, and had stopped using lipstick because of the mess it made on the cup. But this solved that problem. I love it. Pro tip: use makeup remover to get it off at night.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking and looking for a lasting stain. Love the color and staying power. It is a bit drying but l'll deal with that to keep the stain. My first use lasted about 18 to 20 hours. I just ordered 4 more colors.
customer_reviews.author: ann p.

customer_reviews.title: Great brand and value.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I love how light it feels on my lips, some other brands feel like the lipstick encases them. Smudge proof. I have used many other brands of 24 hour lip color and Rimmel is at the top of a short list of favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Jan of Issaquah WA

customer_reviews.title: colors are darker than pictured
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 12 hours with only one touch up after dinner. Didn't smudge under my mask. Didn't dry out. Looks great. My only complaint is the color was darker in person than in the picture. But I'd still purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not as good as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Love this color but after about an hour it fades on the inside of your lips so it looks kind of weird. You will have to carry a lil mirror around and reapply. Not sure why this color does it specifically, I have another color of the same collection and it doesn’t wear away like this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Nc1128

customer_reviews.title: I dislike everything about this lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I dislike everything about this lipstick.. tried to wear it everyday for a week straight and would never stay on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy D

customer_reviews.title: Good and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This is not expensive, but a great product. The trick is to use it sparingly -- put on too much and it will flake off. The applicator puts on too much, so I put on a thin coat using a lip brush. Doesn't take much to give my lips beautiful color. Just Teasing does have a bit of sparkle, which I don't like, but it isn't too noticeable, and the color is lovely. Since I use very little it lasts a long time, and I run out of the attached lip gloss quickly, so then I just have to use some other gloss, and that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Sanger

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the smell
customer_reviews.text: The color is fantastic, and the tacky feeling goes away once you apply the clear balm. My only gripe is how weird the balm tastes and smells -- it's nothing gag-worthy, but the lingering reminder than you have something chemical on your mouth makes it unappealing as an everyday lip product. I use it only when I absolutely need a long lasting lip color.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite red lips color. If you're looking for something that won't budge, this is it. It stays through eating the greasiest foods, drinking coffee, drinking water, talking all day, doing a kickboxing workout, and still looks good by the time you head to bed. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Macki

customer_reviews.title: BEST LONG WEAR EVER.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the BEST long wearing lipstick. Doesnt smudge or smear. Kiss proof( but not a full on love fest makeout session) Food and drink proof and other oral activities proof!! It is super drying though... make sure to reapply attached gloss after any of above activities
customer_reviews.author: TheRealWonderWoman

customer_reviews.title: Great staying power want more topcoat
customer_reviews.text: Great Value for money I like that it's not flat matte or dry wish it had more top coat or that you can but a whole topcoat separate because I use it far more than the base
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Best brand
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased literally twenty different brands of supposedly long lasting lipsticks over the years. This happens to be the best. And the most affordable. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Frananicolini

customer_reviews.title: Rimm lipstain
customer_reviews.text: Rimmel Provocalips Lip Stain is so so. Not the best but has good consistency. Not very long lasting but is a nice lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Azucarpeach

customer_reviews.title: Best lipstick ever!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lipstick. I did some research before buying as I hate spending a lot on makeup. This is my new go to lipstick. Stays on for hours and it doesn't feel dry on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Cheesy3

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 stars on moisture just because the lipstick itself isn’t moisturizing at all. But I LOVE the color and it’s absolutely smudge proof as long as you wait long enough after applying to let it dry on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Traci D.

customer_reviews.title: Stayed on and looked great
customer_reviews.text: This took longer to dry than I expected and for a few minutes I was dreading having goopy lips. But it soon dried and I forgot about it. I ate chips with dip, hot chocolate, and kissed my husband a few times. Then slept.... and the rosy color was still there the next day! I was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie B.

customer_reviews.title: I would not repurchase
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this lip color, it does not stay on the lip, it looks and feel clumpy when you apply it to your lip. I did like the primer, that made your lip feel smooth for that I gave 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TANIA WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Truly long wear
customer_reviews.text: Literally lasts for hours. It doea dry down and the color dulls. But reapplying the clear side can give it a boost. But it is truly long wear. Almost transfer resistant. Some transfer but not enough to feel bummed out about. This is a favorite of mine. I use soap and water to remove with a lip scrubber.
customer_reviews.author: Daricka

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting smudge proof lipstick
customer_reviews.text: It felt funny on my lips. It’s not smudge proof at all. I will not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jean Rhodus

customer_reviews.title: Lika Rikadze
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. After trying so many products (which were claiming to be waterproof, but they are not :( ) I have finally found the lipstick, which really stays for a very long time (about 7-8 hours) even after drinking coffee, tea, eating meals. Besides, this product does not dry lips and it has not given me any allergic reaction. Overall, I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect for me. It stayed on until I eat a sandwich. There was barely any color left on my lips. I'll still use it. It a very nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip stain I have ever used. It doesnt dry my lips out, the color is gorgeous, and it stays on for soooo long! Def worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great, when it arrives in one piece.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have used it for years! Ordered from Amazon and it came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jones

customer_reviews.title: best so far
customer_reviews.text: Having to wear a mask 90% of an 8.5 hour shift every day. This is great! I eat drink and have even fallen asleep with it on and it does not come off just gets a bit dry but reapplying the moisturizer helps that for the most part. (i bought 3 different colors all very nice)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This stuff doesn't flake off like others do. It will stay on, at least partially, for about 3 days. Apply a thin layer though because the thicker it is the faster it comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Actually long lasting
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't dry out your lips as bad as some other lips stains, but you'll still want some chapstick. Love the color and lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: The stain stays around the edge of your lips only... wipes off easily...I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kelli galvis

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its color stay promise.
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick definitely stays on and lasts all day long. No touch ups ever. It doesn't flake or make your lips feel dry. I've been using this brand for quite sometime as to me, it's the best color stay I've used. My boyfriend doesn't mind kissing me when I wear it since it doesn't come off on him.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cagle

customer_reviews.title: The color really stays on.
customer_reviews.text: This lip stain is great for all day color, but is very sticky and dry. You need to use the gloss that comes with it or another gloss. I do wish there were more colors available. It does the job keeping it's color, even after a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Kassing

customer_reviews.title: Stays almost 24hrs
customer_reviews.text: This product is really phenomenal. Not real moisturizing but in it's longevity - you can eat and drink and your lipstick will stay on! The next day you have a proof of what you wore last night :)
customer_reviews.author: HighPeak

customer_reviews.title: Great lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand! I have to clean it off with makeup remover because it never comes off but it’s still soft and moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Lee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smudge
customer_reviews.text: It.does.not.budge. I’ve kissed my boyfriend with it, slept in it, worn it all night through drinking and eating- you name it- this lipstick stays on in perfect condition until you remove it. I’m gonna wear it to my wedding I think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm highly impressed
customer_reviews.text: I wore it for 9 hours, ate and drank with it, it never smudged and I never touched it up. The picture I included is after 9 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love it and have it in my monthly subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: The gloss side of my tube was DRY - not really any gloss !!
customer_reviews.text: NOT SURE IF I WOULD PURCHASE IT AGAIN ... SEEMS OK... BUT THE GLOSS SIDE OF MINE WAS SO DRY THERE IS NEXT TO NO GLOSS AND I LIKE GLOSS OVER MY LIP COLOR .. BUT THAT WAS THE TUBE I REC. - MAYBE OTHERS ARE NOT LIKE THAT ... I LIKE THE COLOR .....
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: I”ll call you
customer_reviews.text: Long wearing. I can eat and still have lipstick on my lips. I like rimmel better than covergirl. I have been wearing this type of lipstick for years
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different long lasting lip sticks and stains. This is the only one that lasts me all day while at work, drinking water and eating. After you eat it comes off a little on your inner lip but just re apply in that specific area. Color is almost same color as lips.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

product_meta.title: Rimmel Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Liquid Lip Lipstick, Heart Breaker, 0.14 oz
product_meta.description: Color:Heart Breaker| Size:Pack of 1Provocalips 16HR KissProof Liquid Lip Colour delivers high impact 16 hour kiss-proof, food-proof and transfer-proof color. An exclusive 2 step product, Provocalips 16HR KissProof Lip Colour is incredibly lightweight and flexible and adapts to the movement of your lips.
feature_bullets: It's a kiss Proof liquid lipstick that delivers a glossy finish and 16 hours of endless colour
A two step process applies and locks in Vibrant hues
The Lightweight and flexible formula adapts to lip movement for lasting wear
A fun and flirty addition to any make up set

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
